data.name: Trove - Mantle of Power Maniac Edition
data.detailed_description:
Grab your friends and set off for adventure in Trove, the ultimate action MMO!

Mantle of Power, Trove’s first expansion, is jam-packed with mountains of new content. An increased level-cap, new ways to advance, customizable class abilities, wild new elemental worlds, and more are coming straight at you, and this pack is designed to help you jump straight in!

Push your power level right off the charts with the Mantle of Power Maniac Edition!
This bundle is bursting with tons of Gems and hundreds of Boosters to help you customize your favorite classes, plus a celestial aura sure to make you shine like the star you are.

Includes:

  • Sun and Moon Stellar Aura
  • 2 Class Gem Keys
  • 10 Empowered Gem Boxes
  • 190 Gem Booster Boxes
  • 500 Jade Clover Boosters
  • 200 Glittering Horseshoe Boosters
  • 100 Lapis Luckbug Boosters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista 32-bit Service Pack 2
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2XXX @ 2.0GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 @ 2.6GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Glyph Client and registered Trion Worlds Account

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.7.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Two button mouse, Glyph Client, and registered Trion Worlds Account
